mapper.select: select hd.no,hd.aptCode,hd.dealAmount,hd.dealYear,hd.dealMonth,hd.dealDay,hd.area,hd.floor,hd.type,hd.rentMoney, hi.aptCode,hi.aptName,hi.dongCode,hi.dongName,hi.buildYear,hi.jibun,hi.lat,hi.lng from housedeal hd join houseinfo hi on hd.aptCode = hi.aptCode where hi.dongCode LIKE concat(#{dongCode},'%')

select hd.no,hd.aptCode,hd.dealAmount,hd.dealYear,hd.dealMonth,hd.dealDay,hd.area,hd.floor,hd.type,hd.rentMoney from housedeal hd join houseinfo hi on hd.aptCode = hi.aptCode where hi.aptName LIKE concat('%',#{aptName},'%')
